short_summary: The contract requires the maintenance of a 356km highway section from km133 to km 589.
description: Work under this contract consist of maintaining the Alaska Highway South Section from Km 133 to Km 589. The Work comprises of year-round and seasonal maintenance activities on and off the Highway, for a 3 year term. The anticipated start date for this Contract Work is Jun 1, 2025. The Contractor will be required to supply the management and supervision or all labor, equipment and materials (unless otherwise noted) to complete the work such as, but not limited to, highway surface maintenance, winter maintenance, drainage maintenance and other activities listed in the work specifications.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Description

* **Announcement Title:** EZ011-241081 Highway Maintenance and Repair South Section Km 133 to Km 589
* **Translated Title (French):** EZ011-241081 Entretien et réparation de la section sud de la route, du kilomètre 133 au kilomètre 589
* **Announcement Identifier (English):** WS4322888816-Doc4324344301
* **Amendment Number (English):** 1
* **Solicitation (English):** WS4322888816

## Key Dates and Information

* **Publication Date:** 24 November 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 12 December 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Last Modified Date:** 4 December 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 29 March 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 30 June 2028

## Tender Status and Category

* **English Status:** Expired
* **French Status:** Expiré
* **Procurement Category:** Construction Services (CNST)

## Contracting Entity and End User Information

* **Contracting Entity Name (English):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity Information:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Notice and Tender Details

* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Additional Information

* **Trade Agreements:** A series of applicable trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others.
* **Region of Opportunity:** No specific information provided.
* **Region and Country of Delivery:** Canada and British Columbia.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18105460
